attributes.title: How The Ecosystem Was Critical And Why We Need Kailasa Nation  || 5 June 2020 ||
attributes.description:
5 JUNE 2020,  PARAMASHIVOHAM LEVEL 2 SEASON 5 - DAY 12

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA

*TODAY IS THE AUSPICIOUS DAY - NITHYANANDA PURNIMA!

*31 YEARS COMPLETED AND 32ND YEAR BEGINNING ON THIS VERY DAY - VAIKASI MONTH, VISHAKA NAKSHATRA, PURNIMA THITHI - THE GREAT EXPERIENCE HAS MANIFESTED BEAUTIFULLY IN THIS BEING, THROUGH THIS BODY. 

*I HAVE A SMALL FEW MINUTES DOCUMENTARY TO PRESENT TO ALL OF YOU. THEN I WILL EXPLAIN AND EXPAND EXACTLY WHAT HAPPENED ON THIS DAY. MORE DETAILS I WILL REVEAL. 

*ON THIS SAME VAIKASI MONTH, VISHAKHA NAKSHATRA, AS PER ENGLISH CALENDAR, 20 MAY 1989 THIS HAPPENED. SO 31 YEARS HAVE COMPLETED AND 32ND YEAR IS STARTING. THIS VAIKASHI VISHAKHAM HAS MULTIPLE IMPORTANCES IN HINDU TRADITION AND FOR KAILASA:
SUBRAHMANYA WAS GIVEN ‘SARVAJNANOTTARA AGAMA’ BY PARAMASHIVA ON THIS VERY DAY BUDDHA WAS BORN, BECAME ENLIGHTENED AND LEFT THE BODY, ALL ON THIS DAY.
JNANASAMBANDAR, GURU PUJA MAHOTSAVA HAPPENS ON THIS VERY THREE DAYS FROM VISHAKHA NAKSHATRA TO MULA NAKSHATRA. HE HAD PARAMASHIVA SAYUJYAM ON MULA NAKSHATRA. 
AND MY ENLIGHTENMENT DAY!

*EVERY TIME I EXPLAIN WHAT HAPPENED THAT DAY - 20 MAY 1989 - I OPEN LAYER BY LAYER, DEEPER AND DEEPER ASPECTS OF WHAT HAS HAPPENED ON THAT VERY DAY AND REVEAL DEEPER AND DEEPER TRUTHS. PARAMASHIVA STARTED MANIFESTING AS PARAMESHWARA ON THIS VERY DAY, THROUGH THIS BEING AND THROUGH THIS BODY. 

*TODAY IS NOT ONLY THE ANNIVERSARY OF THE ENLIGHTENMENT DAY, TODAY IS ALSO THE DAY OF FIRST INITIATION. THE MOMENT PARAMASHIVA STARTED MANIFESTING AS PARAMESHWARA, FIRST THING I DID IS CALLING MY CLASSMATE AND GIVING HIM A POWER DEMO. SO TODAY IS THE FIRST POWER DEMONSTRATION DAY! TODAY IS THE FIRST INITIATION DAY. THIRD, I GAVE HIM ENERGY DARSHAN AND HUG, SO TODAY IS THE FIRST ENERGY DARSHAN DAY! FOURTH, I EXPLAINED THIS WHOLE SCIENCE OF POWER MANIFESTATION TO HIM. SO TODAY IS THE FIRST SATSANG DAY! LITERALLY I STARTED ALL MY WORK - SATSANG, INITIATION, POWER DEMONSTRATION AND ENERGY DARSHAN THIS VERY DAY. LITERALLY I HAVE STARTED THE ENRICHING ACTIVITIES OF KAILASA ON THIS VERY DAY. 

*TODAY IS THE ANNIVERSARY OF NOT ONLY MY ENLIGHTENMENT, IT IS THE ANNIVERSARY OF THE FIRST ENERGY DARSHAN, FIRST INITIATION, FIRST SATSANG, FIRST POWER MANIFESTATION DEMONSTRATION. 

*IT HAS BEEN 31 YEARS OF SINCERE ENRICHING BY THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA AND THE PROTECTION OF KALABHAIRAVA. KAILASA HAS BECOME REALITY. 31 YEARS COMPLETED AND 32ND YEAR STARTING. WHAT A DAY!

*WHAT HAS HAPPENED TODAY IS PARAMASHIVA MANIFESTING AS PARAMESHWARA THROUGH THIS BEING AND THROUGH THIS BODY. THAT IS WHAT I AM TRYING TO CONVEY THROUGH MULTIPLE WORDS LIKE: ‘360 DEGREES I WAS ABLE TO SEE’ AND ‘I COULD SEE I AM THE WHOLE COSMOS….’ THE PURE PARAMASHIVA STATE STARTED MANIFESTING AS THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING, SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS AND KAILASA OF PARAMASHIVA THROUGH THIS BEING

*I WILL EXPLAIN FEW THINGS THAT HAPPENED BEFORE THE ENLIGHTENMENT EXPERIENCE. YOU WILL UNDERSTAND WHY THIS EXPERIENCE HAPPENED IN ME. 

*IT ALL STARTED WITH ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL TELLING THAT WE ARE NOT THE BODY, WE ARE BEYOND THE BODY. HE WAS TEACHING RAMANA MAHARSHI'S TEACHINGS. I RAN HOME AND WANTED TO TEST: ‘HOW CAN WE BEYOND THE BODY AND PAIN AND SUFFERINGS. I TOOK THE RAZOR...IN THOSE DAYS MY FATHER USED TO HAVE THE RAZOR BLADE SLIDE IN MODEL. I TOOK IT AND LITERALLY CUT MY THIGH. OF COURSE I WAS BLEEDING. 

*MY MOTHER SAW AND RUSHED ME TO THE HOSPITAL ACROSS THE ROAD, TO OUR FAMILY DOCTOR. HIS NAME IS KARUNANIDHI. ALMOST 13 STITCHES HE HAD TO MAKE TO STOP THE BLEEDING. AND HE TOLD IN FRONT OF ME TO MY PARENTS: ‘THIS IS NOT ACCIDENTALLY CUT. HE HAS PURPOSELY DONE IT BECAUSE IT IS SO DEEP. ASK HIM WHY HE DID IT.’ 

*SO THEY STARTED INVESTIGATING WHY I DID IT. THE DOCTOR EVEN HAD A DOUBT WHETHER IT WAS A SUICIDE ATTEMPT! I EXPLAINED THE WHOLE THING TO MY MOTHER, FATHER AND DOCTOR, THAT ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL TOLD, ‘WE DON’T HAVE PAIN’ AND I JUST WANTED TO CHECK WHETHER I HAVE PAIN OR NOT SO I CUT MYSELF TO SEE WHETHER I HAVE PAIN AND SUFFERING OR NOT. 

*LISTEN TO THESE WORDS: NEITHER MY MOTHER NOR MY FATHER WAS ANGRY WITH ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL. THEY DID NOT HAVE A SINGLE ILL FEELING TO MY GURU ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL!
